name: Cave In - Kynokaze
description:
This game is developed with Lua and Love2D.  I created this in about 49 hours. For this time I do all scripts and graphism for my game. I wanted to try digital painting and it was difficult but I learned a lot of thing and I appreciated to create all my game alone. Except for the sound and the music, I don't have the skill for that for the moment :). 

My game is hard to finish, I hope you have determination to get victory ! Be brave soldier or you will die in this cave ! 

You can found my sounds and the music in these sound banks here :

https://www.auboutdufil.com/index.php?tag=8-bit
https://lasonotheque.org/detail-0237-cris-et-applaudissements-d-ados-2.html
https://lasonotheque.org/detail-0477-cri-wilhelm.html

When I uploaded my game, I saw that resolution problems are presents. For some screens, player can't see everything and so he can't play. Therefore, I have created another version for lower resolution of screen. If you can play with the original game it is better !
 
Resolution of original game is 960x960
Resolution of 2nd version is 480x480

Enjoy !
